# E5 - MOSAiC Portal {style="font-size: 3rem; font-weight: 700; margin-bottom: 1rem; text-shadow: 2px 2px 4px rgba(0,0,0,0.3);"}

## Monitoring of Species Across Intervals & Colonies {style="font-size: 1.4rem; font-weight: 300; margin-bottom: 2rem; opacity: 0.95;"}

::: {style="background: rgba(255,255,255,0.1); padding: 1.5rem; border-radius: 1rem; backdrop-filter: blur(10px); margin-bottom: 2rem;"}
A comprehensive **time-series study** of three coral species from Moorea, French Polynesia, providing genomic insights into marine invertebrate responses across space and time.
:::

### üî¨ Project Overview {style="color: #495057; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 0.5rem;"}

This portal serves complementary purposes of **direct data delivery** and offering a **multi-species genome browser**. Our research encompasses a comprehensive time-series study of three coral species sampled from reef sites in Moorea, French Polynesia.

::: {.logo-container style="text-align: center; margin: 1.5rem 0;"}
![E5-MOSAiC project logo](img/sm_logo.png){width="300" style="max-width: 100%; height: auto; filter: drop-shadow(0 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1));" loading="lazy"}
:::
:::

::: {.col .species-info style="background: linear-gradient(145deg, #fff3cd, #ffeaa7); padding: 2rem; border-radius: 1rem; box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); border-left: 4px solid #f39c12;"}
### üê† Species Study {style="color: #856404; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 0.5rem;"}

Our research focuses on three coral species:

::: {.species-list style="margin: 1rem 0;"}
- **ü™∏ *Acropora pulchra***
- **ü™∏ *Pocillopora tuahiniensis***  
- **ü™∏ *Porites evermanni***
:::

**Study Design:**
- üèùÔ∏è **2 locations** in Moorea
- ü™∏ **5 colonies** per species per site
- üìÖ **4 time intervals** (TP1‚ÄìTP4)
- üß¨ **40 samples** per species
:::

:::

::: {.methodology-section style="background: linear-gradient(145deg, #d1ecf1, #bee5eb); padding: 2rem; border-radius: 1rem; box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); margin-bottom: 3rem; border-left: 4px solid #17a2b8;"}
### üìà Research Framework {style="color: #0c5460; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 0.5rem;"}

This dataset provides a **rich framework** for investigating how environmental and biological factors shape marine invertebrate responses through space and time, while controlling for genetic and ecological heterogeneity.
